content.title: Ministry of Trade & Industry
content.subtitle: A leading global city of enterprise and talent, a vibrant nation of innovation and opportunity

cards.title: Committee of Supply (COS) 2024
cards.text: In 2023, Singapore's economy expanded by 1.1%, attributed to its diversified sectors and strong global connections. This growth has led to a high standard of living for Singaporeans, with ample job opportunities.

cards.title: Singapore economy expanded by 1.1% in 2023
cards.imageAlt: A banner worded "Economic Survey of Singapore 2023"
cards.text: MTI has maintained the GDP growth forecast for 2024 at 1.0 to 3.0 per cent.

cards.title: Safeguards for Electricity Consumers
cards.imageAlt: A banner saying "Safeguards for Electricity Consumers"
cards.text: EMA will strengthen regulations for electricity retailers to safeguard consumers. This includes bolstering requirements to withstand market changes and implementing protections for consumers in case of contract termination or market exit by retailers.

infoBoxes.title: Manpower for Strategic Economic Priorities
infoBoxes.description: Supporting businesses that contribute to Singapore's strategic economic priorities.

infoBoxes.title: Partnerships
infoBoxes.description: Multilateral collaborations to strengthen regional cooperation and build capabilities.

infoBoxes.title: Digital Economy Agreements
infoBoxes.description: Digital trade rules and digital economy collaborations between two or more economies.

infoBoxes.title: Pro-Enterprise Panel (PEP)
infoBoxes.description: A pro-enterprise environment that facilitates the growth of businesses.
